lines.text: I didn't come here to be drowned in wine and smothered in cushions.
[as the traitor Melchior is trapped in flames and pleading for mercy]
I hear no voice. The dead cannot speak.
Evil? How strange you are. Where I come from, nothing is evil. Everything that gives pleasure is good!
There, not far, just ahead - Sodom and Gomorrah.
Separate... but in their full view...
